trans-unit.source: Comprises utility methods for constructing a command line.
trans-unit.target: 組成建構命令列的公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 建構函式

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If true, hyphens should be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 true，表示連字號應該加上引號。

trans-unit.source: Default constructor
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with file name represented by the parameter, inserting quotation marks if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 將以參數表示的檔案名稱附加至命令列，並視需要插入引號。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The task item specification to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的工作項目規格。

trans-unit.source: If it is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法不會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with the file name of the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> 物件的檔名附加至命令列。

trans-unit.source: This method appends the command line with a task item specification, and surrounds task item specification with quotations marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法中附加命令列使用工作項目規格，而且會括住以視需要加上引號的工作項目規格。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the task item specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格之前的工作項目規格。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The file name to append.
trans-unit.target: 要附加的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If it is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法不會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with file name represented by the parameter, inserting quotation marks if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 將以參數表示的檔案名稱附加至命令列，並視需要插入引號。

trans-unit.source: This method appends the command line with a file name, and surrounds the file name with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會附加命令列與檔案名稱，並加上引號，視需要在檔案名稱周圍。

trans-unit.source: If the first character of the file name is a dash, then `.\` is added to the beginning of the file name to distinguish it from a switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個字元的檔案名稱是虛線，然後`.\`加入檔案名稱加以區別參數的開頭。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格之前的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: `AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` yields `.\-StrangeFileName.cs`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendFileNameIfNotNull("-StrangeFileName.cs")` 會產生`.\-StrangeFileName.cs`。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a list of file names, inserting quotation marks if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 將檔名清單附加至命令列，並插入引號 (如果必要的話)。

trans-unit.source: The task item specifications to append.
trans-unit.target: 要附加的工作項目規格。

trans-unit.source: If the array is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter to put between task item specifications in the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要放在命令列中工作項目規格之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with the list of file names in the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> array, separated by the specified delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> 陣列中的檔名清單附加至命令列，並以指定的分隔符號 (Delimiter) 分隔。

trans-unit.source: This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法和附加命令列與檔案名稱周圍加上引號，視需要的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The file names are separated by the specified delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的分隔符號分隔的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，檔案名稱前面。

trans-unit.source: See example in <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendFileNamesIfNotNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱範例<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendFileNamesIfNotNull%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The file names to append.
trans-unit.target: 要附加的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the array is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter to put between file names in the command line.
trans-unit.target: 命令列中的檔案名稱都有分隔符號隔開。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with the list of file names in the specified <see langword="string" /> array, separated by the specified delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之 <see langword="string" /> 陣列中的檔名清單附加至命令列，並以指定的分隔符號 (Delimiter) 分隔。

trans-unit.source: This method appends the command line with file names, and surrounds the file names with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法和附加命令列與檔案名稱周圍加上引號，視需要的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The file names are separated by the specified delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的分隔符號分隔的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the file names.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，檔案名稱前面。

trans-unit.source: `AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` yields `Alpha.cs,Beta.cs`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendFileNamesIfNotNull(new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Beta.cs"}, ",")` 會產生`Alpha.cs,Beta.cs`。

trans-unit.source: The file name to append.
trans-unit.target: 要附加的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a file name, and surrounds the file name with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案名稱附加至命令列，並視需要在檔案名稱周圍加上引號。

trans-unit.source: If the first character of the file name is a dash, then `.\` is added to the beginning of the file name to distinguish it from a switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個字元的檔案名稱是虛線，然後`.\`加入檔案名稱加以區別參數的開頭。

trans-unit.source: This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會將附加命令列，加上空格，再執行。

trans-unit.source: `AppendFileNameWithQuoting("-StrangeFileName.cs")` yields `.\-StrangeFileName.cs`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendFileNameWithQuoting("-StrangeFileName.cs")` 會產生`.\-StrangeFileName.cs`。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to append to.
trans-unit.target: 要附加的目標緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The text to be quoted.
trans-unit.target: 要使用引號的文字。

trans-unit.source: Appends given text to the buffer after first quoting the text if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，請在第一個使用引號的文字後，將指定文字附加到緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Adds a space to the specified string, given the string is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 將空格加入指定字串，前提是該字串非空。

trans-unit.source: This method is only available to inherited classes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只適用於繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with the specified switch.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的切換參數附加至命令列。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch.
trans-unit.target: 將參數附加至命令列。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The switch parameter to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will be added as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 會視需要加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes a task item specification that acts a single string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將切換參數附加至命令列，這個切換參數接受作為單一字串參數的工作項目規格。

trans-unit.source: This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封裝加上引號，視需要個別的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: See example in <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchIfNotNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱範例<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchIfNotNull%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The switch parameter to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will be added as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 會視需要加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes a single string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將切換參數附加至命令列，該切換參數接受單一字串參數。

trans-unit.source: This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封裝加上引號，視需要個別的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` yields `/source:\"File Name.cs\"`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` 會產生`/source:\"File Name.cs\"`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of switch parameters to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will be added as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 會視需要加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If the array is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter that separates individual parameters.
trans-unit.target: 分隔個別參數的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: This value can be empty, but it cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是空的，但不可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of task item specifications that act as string parameters.
trans-unit.target: 將切換參數附加至命令列，該切換參數接受以字串參數表示的工作項目規格陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封裝加上引號，視需要個別的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: See example in <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchIfNotNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱範例<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchIfNotNull%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of switch parameters to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will be added as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 會視需要加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If the array is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter that separates individual parameters.
trans-unit.target: 分隔個別參數的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: This value can be empty, but it cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是空的，但不可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of string parameters.
trans-unit.target: 將切換參數附加至命令列，該切換參數接受字串參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method encapsulates individual file names with quotation marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封裝加上引號，視需要個別的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` yields `/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendSwitchIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` 會產生`/sources:Alpha.cs;\"Be ta.cs\"`。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch, without attempting to encapsulate the switch parameters with quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 將參數 (Switch) 附加至命令列，而不嘗試使用引號封裝選項參數 (Parameter)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The switch parameter to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will not be added.
trans-unit.target: 將不會加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes a task item specification as a single string parameter, without attempting to encapsulate the switch parameter with quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 將使用工作項目規格作為單一字串參數 (parameter) 的切換參數 (switch) 附加至命令列，但不嘗試以引號封裝切換參數 (switch parameter)。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: See example in <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱範例<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The switch parameter to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will not be added.
trans-unit.target: 將不會加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes a single string parameter, without attempting to encapsulate the switch parameter with quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 附加命令列與使用單一字串參數 (parameter) 的切換參數 (switch)，卻不嘗試以引號封裝切換參數 (switch parameter)。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: `AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` yields `/source:File Name.cs`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/source:", "File Name.cs")` 會產生`/source:File Name.cs`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of switch parameters to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will not be added.
trans-unit.target: 將不會加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If the array is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter that separates individual parameters.
trans-unit.target: 分隔個別參數的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: This value can be empty, but it cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是空的，但不可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of task item specifications that act as string parameters, without attempting to encapsulate them with quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 附加命令列與使用作為字串參數 (parameter) 之工作項目規格陣列的切換參數 (switch)，但不嘗試以引號封裝切換參數。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: See example in <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱範例<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the switch to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of switch parameters to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的切換參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks will not be added.
trans-unit.target: 將不會加入引號。

trans-unit.source: If the array is <see langword="null" />, then this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果陣列為 <see langword="null" />，則這個方法沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The delimiter that separates individual parameters.
trans-unit.target: 分隔個別參數的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: This value can be empty, but it cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是空的，但不可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with a switch that takes an array of string parameters, without attempting to encapsulate switch parameters with quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 附加命令列與使用字串參數 (parameter) 陣列的切換參數 (switch)，卻不嘗試以引號封裝切換參數 (switch parameter)。

trans-unit.source: If the command line is not empty, then this method also appends the command line with a space, before the switch.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列不是空的則這個方法也會附加命令列，加上空格，在參數之前。

trans-unit.source: `AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` yields `/sources:Alpha.cs;Be ta.cs`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendSwitchUnquotedIfNotNull("/sources:", new string[] {"Alpha.cs", "Be ta.cs"}, ";")` 會產生`/sources:Alpha.cs;Be ta.cs`。

trans-unit.source: The string to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的字串。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with string, without attempting to encapsulate the string with quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 附加命令列和字串，卻不嘗試以引號封裝字串。

trans-unit.source: This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會將附加命令列，加上空格，再執行。

trans-unit.source: `AppendTextUnquoted(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` yields `Folder name\\filename.cs`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendTextUnquoted(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` 會產生`Folder name\\filename.cs`。

trans-unit.source: The string to append to the command line.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至命令列的字串。

trans-unit.source: Appends the command line with string, and surrounds the string with quotations marks as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 命令列附加字串，並視需要以引號括住字串。

trans-unit.source: This method does not append the command line with a space, before executing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會將附加命令列，加上空格，再執行。

trans-unit.source: `AppendTextWithQuoting(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` yields `\"Folder name\\filename.cs\"`.
trans-unit.target: `AppendTextWithQuoting(@"Folder name\filename.cs")` 會產生`\"Folder name\\filename.cs\"`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> instance representing the command line for inheriting classes.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示繼承類別之命令列的 <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" /> for inheriting classes.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別的 <see cref="T:System.Text.StringBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: The string to examine for characters that require quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 字串，用於檢查需要引號的字元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified string parameter should be surrounded with quotation marks because it contains white space.
trans-unit.target: 判斷是否應在包含空白字元的指定字串參數周圍加上引號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the switch parameter should be surrounded with quotation marks; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應在切換參數周圍加上引號則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the length of the command line.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令列的長度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the command line as a string.
trans-unit.target: 以字串形式傳回命令列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the command line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示命令列。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask> that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolTask>執行[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper> classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder>， <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper>，和<xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskLoggingHelper>類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: msbuild_ToolTask#1
trans-unit.target: msbuild_ToolTask#1

trans-unit.source: A string representing the switch name for the error message.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示錯誤訊息的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the switch parameter to scan for double-quotes.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示要掃描雙引號的切換參數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an error if the command line parameter contains a double-quote (") character.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令列參數包含一個雙引號 (") 字元，則會傳回錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Because double quotes are illegal in command line parameters, this method helps prevent parameter injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: 因為雙引號在命令列參數中不合法，所以此方法有助於避免參數插入式攻擊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes%2A> is a virtual method so that your applications can override this method if you want to allow double-quotes escaped in filenames.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.CommandLineBuilder.VerifyThrowNoEmbeddedDoubleQuotes%2A> 為虛擬方法，使您的應用程式可以覆寫這個方法，如果您想要允許雙引號逸出的檔案名稱。
